author: CMSTrackerDPG
body:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24851
As I understood, there is no plan to use virgin raw for the upcoming HI run, but we are submitting this bugfix to have it in place just in case.

CC: @icali @alesaggio
title: [10_3_X] Regional strip unpacker: support for legacy modes and bugfix for virgin raw
